maqras.text: i do-eub-eul dugo maengsehasa
geudaeneun i do-eub-ui jayuloun geoju-in-ila
seonjowa jason-eul dugo maengsehasa
sillo hananim-eun ingan-eulo hayeogeum nolyeoggwa silyeonsog-eseo saldolog chang johayeossnani
eoneu nugudo bulsinjaleul jeabhal su eobsdago saeng-gag haneunyo
sillo naneun manh-eun jaesan-eul tangjin hayeossseubnida lago bulsinjaneun malhal geos-ila
eoneu nugudo geuleul jikyeoboji anihandago bulsinjaneun saeng-gaghaneunyo
hananim-i geuege du nun-eul ju ji ani haessdeonyo
hanaui hyeowa du ibsul-eul juji ani haessdeonyo
hananim-eun geuege du gil-eul seolmyeonghayeossnola
geuneun himdeun gil-eseo sugohalyeo ani haneunyo
geu himdeun gil-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geugeos-eun noyeleul haebangsikyeo ju neun il-iyo
baegopeun ja-ege eumsig-eul bepu neun geos-imyeo
chincheog-ui goadeulgwa
meonji tuseong-iga doen gananhan jadeul-ege jaseon-eul bepuneun geos-ila
geuleon hu mid-eum-eulo seologa seolo-ege innaehago seologa seolo-ege salang-eul bepuneun geos-eulo
ideulman-i upyeon-e issneun donglyo deul-ila
geuleona hananim-ui malsseum-eul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-eun jwapyeon-e issneun donglyo deullo
geudeul wieneun dadhyeojin buljiog man-i iss-eul ppun-ila
taeyang-gwa geu bich-eul dugo maengsehasa
geu dwileul ieun dal-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
taeyang-ui yeong-gwang-eul boyeojuneun naj-euldugo maengsehamyeo
geugeos-eul sumgineun bam-eul dugo maeng sehamyeo
haneulgwa geugeos-eul se-un junim-eul dugo maengsehasa
daejiwa geugeos-eul pyeolchyeo noh-eusin junim-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
ingangwa geugeos-eul changjohan junim-euldugo maengsehasa
seongwa ag-i mueos-ingaleul ihaeha dolog hasyeossnani
seuseuloleul sungyeolhage haneun jaga seunglijaimyeo
seuseuloleul bulgyeolhage haneun ja silpaehan jala
samudeu baegseong-eun geudeul-ui oman eulo yeeonjaleul geoyeoghayeoss-eumae
geudeul jung gajang saaghan jaga il-eoseoss-eul ttae
seonjijaga geudeul-ege malhagil geugeos-eun hananim-ui amnagtaini geugeos i mul-eul masimae banghaehaji malla ha yeoss-euna
geudeul-eun geuleul geoyeoghan hu geu amnagtaleul salhaehayeoss-euni geu joeag-eu lo inhayeo junim-eun geudeul-eul myeolmangke hasa gubyeol-eobs-i wanjeon myeolmangke hasyeoss nola
sillo geubun-eun geu gyeolgwa-e daehayeo jogeumdo yeomlyeohaji ani hasinila
eoduwojineun bam-eul dugo maengsehasa
bich-eul bichu-ineun naj-eul dugo maeng sehamyeo
namnyeoleul changjohasin junim-eul dugo maengsehanani
sillo neohuideul-ui haeng-wineun yeoleoga jila
jaseon-eul bepulgo dulyeowo hamyeo
jinlileul jeung-eonhaneun jaleul wihae
hananim-eun geuga chugbog-eulo ganeun gil-eul swibge hayeo jusinola
geuleona insaeghago jagijasin-i chungmanhadago saeng-gaghamyeo
jinlileul geoyeoghaneunja
hananim-eun geuga bulhaeng-eulo ga neun gil-eul swibge halini
geuga jiog-eulo hyanghal ttaeneun geu ui jaesan-i geuleul yuighage moshanila
indohaneun geos-eun hananim-ui il ila
naesewa hyeonsedo geubunkke issnola
geuleomeulo naega neohuiege gyeog lyeolhage taoleuneun buljiog-eul gyeong-goha nani
gajang bulhaenghan jadeulman-i geugos e ileuge doenila
geuneun balo jinlileul geoyeoghago oemyeonhaneun jala
geuleona hananimkke heonsinhaneun janeun geugos-eulobuteo je-oe doegeoneul
ideul-eun geudeul-ui jaesan-eul bachi myeo seuseuloleul sungyeolke hasa
geuga bepun eunhyee daehan bosang-eul geuui ma-eumsog-e gaj-ji anihago
ojig gajang wie gyesineun junim eul gippeuge hagoja haneun somang-eul ga jin jadeullo
ideul-eun god wanjeonhan gippeum-eul nu lige doelila
achim-eul dugo maengsehago
eodum-i jit-eojineun bam-eul dugo maengsehasa
junimkkeseo geudaeleul beoliji anihaess-eumyeo miwohajido anh-eusinila
sillo geudaeegeneun naesega hyeonseboda na-eulini
junimkkeseo geudaeege eunhyeleul bepulgeos-imae geudaeneun ilohayeo gippeohalila
geubun-eun goain geudaeleul balgyeonhayeo geudaeleul bohohaji ani haessdeonyo
geubun-eun banghwanghaneun geudaeleul balgyeonhayeo geudaeleul indohaji ani haessdeo nyo
geubun-eun gananhaessdeon geudaeleul buyuhage hayeo juji ani haessdeonyo
geuleomeulo goadeul-eul geochilge daehajimalmyeo
guhaneun ja-ege geojeolhaji malgo
geuligo junim-ui eunhyeleul iyagi hala
